item.title: Samuel Barber - Piano Concerto (1962)
item.description: Commissioned by Schirmer in 1959 in honour of the company’s 100th anniversary, written with pianist John Browning in mind. The piano concerto won Barber his second Pulitzer Prize (the first had been given for his opera Vanessa)
